title: Johnny can learn to read
creator_credit: Courtney Milne, Audio Visual Services and University of Guelph
brief_description: Shows the Stott Programmed Reading Kit in use with children who have reading difficulties. The processes of learning to read are broken down into easy stages and each stage is built into a game or some other enjoyable activity.
creator_credit_for_label: Courtney Milne, Audio Visual Services and University of Guelph
